name: Zirodelta
description: Zirodelta is a decentralized protocol built on the Solana blockchain, designed to innovate funding rate farming. It utilizes the $ZDLT token and an advanced trading bot to optimize arbitrage opportunities through automated, oracle-driven technology. The protocol aims to enhance trading efficiency and profitability for users in the decentralized finance (DeFi) space by capturing funding fees and converting market volatility into steady yields.
